sourcesContent:
// 主页 import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { SearchOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; import { Switch } from 'antd'; import '../../assets/css/homepage.css' import iphone from '../../assets/images/iphone.png' import electricity from '../../assets/images/电量.png' import wifi from '../../assets/images/wifi.png' import search from '../../assets/images/搜索.png' import brightness from '../../assets/images/控制.png' import launchpad from '../../assets/images/launchpad.png' import bear from '../../assets/images/bear.png' import vscode from '../../assets/images/vscode.png' import facetime from '../../assets/images/facetime.png' import safari from '../../assets/images/safari.png' import terminal from '../../assets/images/terminal.png' import mail from '../../assets/images/mail.png' import github from '../../assets/images/github.png' import song from '../../assets/images/song.jpg' function Lockscreen(props) { var myDate = new Date() var time = myDate.toLocaleString() const [click, setClick] = useState('false') // const [display, setDisplay] = useState('none') const [mytime, setMytime] = useState(time) const OpenPopUpWindow = (e) => { // console.log(e.currentTarget); let target = e.currentTarget //获取到当前触发事件的对象 // console.log(target.getAttribute('click')); let name = target.getAttribute('name') console.log(name); // 当点击的是iPhone图标时出现弹窗 if (name === 'iphone') { // console.log('打开和关闭iPhone的弹窗'); var popupwindowiphone = document.getElementsByClassName('popupwindowiphone')[0] if (click==='false') { setClick('true') popupwindowiphone.style.display = 'block' // setDisplay('block') // console.log('已打开弹窗') } else { setClick('false') // setDisplay('none') popupwindowiphone.style.display = 'none' // console.log('已关闭弹窗') } } // 当点击的是WiFi图标时出现弹窗 if (name === 'wifi') { } } const ReturnLockScreen = () => { props.history.push('/') } useEffect(() => { setInterval(function () { // console.log('ok'); let timenow = new Date().toLocaleString() setMytime(timenow) },1000) }, []) const onChange = (checked) => { console.log({checked}); } // let checked = document.getElementsByClassName('Switch')[0].aria-checked // console.log(checked); return (
{OpenPopUpWindow(e)}} // click={click} name='iphone' >
Bear
